description.displayText: I knew Yangchen for 3 years before she came to work for me for one year. Her calm, gentle demeanor made it easy for my kids to trust, love and respect her. Yangchen is also detailed oriented and meticulous with housekeeping. She is organized and kept my house in order everyday! Bathrooms were always clean, the floors always washed, the kitchen spotless. My boys are older now and are in school full time. We miss her but understand she has to move on.
description.originalText: I knew Yangchen for 3 years before she came to work for me for one year. Her calm, gentle demeanor made it easy for my kids to trust, love and respect her. Yangchen is also detailed oriented and meticulous with housekeeping. She is organized and kept my house in order everyday! Bathrooms were always clean, the floors always washed, the kitchen spotless. My boys are older now and are in school full time. We miss her but understand she has to move on.

description.displayText: Yangchen worked with our family from March 2014 to January 2017.  She is trustworthy, honest, sweet, gentle, kind, fun, playful, punctual, neat and clean.   My children are now 8 and 5 and still ask about her all the time and when they can visit.  She would be a joy to have in anyone's home and part of your family!
